name: user-service
description: The user microservice provides authentication and user profile management capabilities

scripts.cf:deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file build/infrastructure.packaged.yaml --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --stack-name [DEVELOPMENT_STACK_NAME] --parameter-overrides Environment=development
scripts.build: npm i && npm run test:unit && mkdir -p build && npm run cf:package
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run cf:deploy
